name: yay
description: Yay is a gamification engine, exposing a web service API to bring everyone the joy of gamification.
full_description:
## Yay Introduction
Yay is a **gamification engine**, exposing a web service API, to bring everyone the joy of gamification and integrating any kinds of gamification features into your organisation. Yay originally started as a 36 hours hackathon project at [trivago](https://github.com/trivago) to bring gamification features to our organisation. To integrate yay into many application landscapes it offers flexible extension points to write your own integrations.

## Yay Documentation
How-to-use demo, installation instructions, configuration examples and extension documentation:

* [Installation](https://github.com/sveneisenschmidt/yay/blob/master/docs/installation.md)
* [Configuration](https://github.com/sveneisenschmidt/yay/blob/master/docs/configuration.md)
* [API](https://github.com/sveneisenschmidt/yay/blob/master/docs/api.md)
* [Demo](https://github.com/sveneisenschmidt/yay/blob/master/docs/demo.md)
* [Development](https://github.com/sveneisenschmidt/yay/blob/master/docs/development.md)
* Guides
    * [How to write and configure your integration](hhttps://github.com/sveneisenschmidt/yay/blob/master/docs/guides/integrations.md)
    * [How to write and configure your webhooks](https://github.com/sveneisenschmidt/yay/docs/guides/webhooks.md)
